title: (Michael Caine) - The Whistle Blower
description:
Frank Jones (Michael Caine) is an ordinary law-abiding
businessman.   He served his country during the war, and
he is very proud of his son Bob (Nigel Havers), a Russian
linguist and translator.   Frank&#039;s world is shattered by
the arrival of the police to tell him his son is dead.
&#039;Accidental Death&#039; is the verdict at the inquest, and
so the plot thickens.   The father embarks on his own
investigation into his son&#039;s death and discovers that
there are no limits to what the government will do to
protect its secret activities.   When he finally
unravels the truth, he takes matters into his own hands
in a sensational climax. 

IFM FILM ASSOCIATES INC presents "The Whistle Blower"
A GEOFF REEVE production.   MICHAEL CAINE, JAMES FOX,
NIGEL HAVERS, FELICITY DEAN with JOHN GIELGUD as
"chapple", and KENNETH COLLEY.   And GORDON JACKSON, 
DAVID LANGTON, BARRY FOSTER.
Based on the novel by JOHN HALE.   Screenplay by
JULIAN BOND.
